name: Jason Wang
overview: Jason Wang is co-founder and CEO of Munch On Me, a company that connects people with great food at great prices in local communities. His responsibilities include driving the company vision and finding a passionate team to realize that vision. Prior to Munch On Me, Jason founded a mobile app development firm called 815 Productions. Jason holds a B.S. in Business Administration from the Walter A. Haas School of Business at UC Berkeley.
